description: man with a gaunt face and eyes that are colored over with splotches of brown ink at the left side of the image wearing a suit and tie; on the right side of the image an oval cosmetic mirror on a stand reflects the man's face in profile; sheet is trimmed at the bottom of the page cutting off part of the image and not leaving a bottom border
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.135 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 19 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2319
title: The Man at the Mirror
